roleset.name: the act of sex

role.descr: first (or all when in one mention) partner

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in New Testament. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: These are the people who will not get to enjoy his kingdom : those who sin sexually , those who worship idols , those who commit adultery , men who let other men use them for sex or who have sex with other men , those who steal , those who are greedy , those who drink too much , those who abuse others with insults , and those who cheat .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Loredana Jolie, a former model, is writing a book that the contents reveal the story of her sex with famous golfer Tiger Woods.
